component.name: Blender
component.summary: Free and open source 3D creation suite

description.p: Blender is the free and open source 3D creation suite. It supports the entirety of the 3D pipeline—modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing and motion tracking, even video editing and game creation.

Advanced users employ Blender’s API for Python scripting to customize the application and write specialized tools. Blender is well suited to individuals and small studios who benefit from its unified pipeline and responsive development process.
